entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is encouraging Harry and looking down her list of spells they have already learned. She says that some of these spells are bound to come in handy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is standing by the window and staring down onto the grounds. He asks Harry and Hermione to see what Malfoy is doing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is going to see what Malfoy is doing with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is standing in the shadow of a tree below with Crabbe and Goyle. He is holding his hand up to his mouth and speaking into it.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of Malfoy's friends who are standing in the shadow of a tree below. He seems to be keeping a lookout with Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of Malfoy's friends who are standing in the shadow of a tree below. He seems to be keeping a lookout with Crabbe.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is sending daily owls now.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hermione mentions that walkie-talkies don't work around Hogwarts.
